meanings.definition: The state or quality of being more efficient than usual.
meanings.sent1: The superefficiencies of the new machine saved time and money for the company.
meanings.sent2: The team's superefficiencies in completing tasks ahead of schedule impressed their manager.
meanings.sent3: The robot showed superefficiencies in cleaning the house, finishing in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her superefficiencies in organizing events were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The superefficiencies of the solar panels made them stand out among other energy sources.

meanings.definition: The ability to produce a desired result with minimal waste or effort.
meanings.sent1: The company's superefficiencies in manufacturing led to increased profits.
meanings.sent2: His superefficiencies in problem-solving made him a valuable team member.
meanings.sent3: The chef's superefficiencies in creating delicious dishes amazed the customers.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's superefficiencies on the field were like watching a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The superefficiencies of the new software simplified complex tasks for users.
